summary: The diff shows that App.tsx has been modified to remove CertificationsGallery component import and render, meeting REQ-37. However, the CertificationsGallery.tsx and CertificateModal.tsx files appear in the 'MODIFIED FILES' list rather than as removed/deleted files, indicating they still exist in the codebase. This fails to meet REQ-38 and REQ-39, which explicitly require these files to be deleted.

missing_requirements.requirement: Delete the CertificationsGallery.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/
missing_requirements.reason: The file frontend/src/components/CertificationsGallery.tsx appears in the 'MODIFIED FILES' list instead of 'REMOVED FILES', indicating it still exists in the codebase
